definition:
1. A procession distinguished by ostentation and splendor; a pageant. "All the pomps of a Roman triumph." Addison. 2. Show of magnificence; parade; display; power. Syn. -- Display; parade; pageant; pageantry; splendor; state; magnificence; ostentation; grandeur; pride.

To make a pompons display; to conduct. [Obs.] B. Jonson.
